SEARCH
Package de.dlr.proseo.storagemgr.utils

Klasse ProseoFile

java.lang.Object
de.dlr.proseo.storagemgr.utils.ProseoFile
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
ProseoFileAlluxio, ProseoFilePosix, ProseoFileS3
public abstract class ProseoFile extends Object
Abstract definition of proseo file objects The file definition is based on: File system type, e.g. S3, POSIX Base path, e.g. S3 bucket, POSIX mount point Relative path and file name Example for full path: S3: "s3://bucket/somewhere/file.name" POSIX: "/mntPoint/somewhere/file.name" * Directories are represented by a "/" as last character
Autor:
melchinger
